name: Muglan
content:
Muglan was a Gloovan female criminal who lived during the High Republic Era. After being arrested, Muglan was a sent to the Galactic Republic prison ship Restitution, where she, along with fellow prisoner Parr, served as a bodyguard to Ola Hest. Following the attack on the Restitution by former Nihil Tempest Runner Pan Eyta, Hest was killed and Muglan, with Lourna Dee taking control of the ship, joined the Nihil as part of Lourna Dee's Tempest as a Storm.
Muglan was later present during a battle, in which she, alongside other Nihil, fought to defend the Great Hall of the Nihil against the Republic. She died, being bisected by a desperate Jedi Master Avar Kriss.
Muglan was voiced by Soneela Nankani in the 2021 audio drama The High Republic: Tempest Runner, written by Cavan Scott.
